Title: God Forbid a Worse Thing Should Happen
Actors: Filip Curic, Luka Dragic, Mirjana Rogina, Ivo Gregurevic
Plot: The adventures of a small town Croatian family during the 1960s. The decade will left eternal marks on all of their members, but the most of the story focuses on the youngest one, a boy Frula who discovers the love and fashion of the time.
